entry.title: Saturday night: A few flurries. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. A few flurries beginning near midnight. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 5 this evening. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 04 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Flurries. High plus 3.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending in the morning then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Clearing in the afternoon. High plus 3. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 04 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy in the evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 6 in the evening. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 04 March 2023
